com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree

Class Decorator<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree.Task<E>
      • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree.Decorator<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - type of the blackboard object that tasks use to read or modify game state
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlwaysFail, AlwaysSucceed, Include, Invert, SemaphoreGuard, UntilFail, UntilSuccess

    @TaskConstraint(minChildren=1,
                maxChildren=1)
public abstract class Decorator<E>
extends Task<E>
    A Decorator is a wrapper that provides custom behavior for its child. The child can be of any kind (branch task, leaf task, or another decorator).
